general.description: Haematite Station is an orbital logistics station provided by the Association of Free Traders for their member captains. A chelonian of Terrapin cargo tugs work (but not too hard!) to warehouse metal here from the planet below. Dedicated dockworkers are on stand-by to transfer the loaded pods to visiting bulk freighter captains, providing a useful alternative to a dangerous landing in the gravity well of Lodestone.
general.bar: This spaceport bar actually features an upscale space restaurant providing delectable cuisine to its patrons. Nobody seems to be in much of a rush to leave.
